main event: Civilians reported a UFO sighting near Minot, North Dakota on August 8, 1958, which appeared as a normal aircraft before changing characteristics.
interesting points: The UFO was observed to be circular, approximately 20 ft in diameter, and hovered about 500 ft above the ground., The object remained stationary for about 15-20 minutes before disappearing gradually., The sighting was corroborated by Lieutenant Shultz from the same station., The report noted the weather as partly cloudy at the time of observation., The UFO emitted no visible exhaust or propulsion.
sighted object: circular object about 20 ft in diameter
witness description: Civilians and a military officer (Lieutenant Shultz)
